import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Container } from 'reactstrap' import axios from 'axios' const api = 'http://localhost:3003' function HooksUseEffects() { const [barang, setBarang] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { console.log("Memanggil Use Effects") axios.get(api + '/tampil').then(res => { setBarang: ([res.data.values]) }) }, []) return (

Data Barang

{this.state.barang.map(barang => )}
ID Barang Nama Barang Harga Barang Stok Satuan
{barang.id_barang} {barang.nama_barang} {barang.harga_barang} {barang.stok} {barang.satuan} ]
) } export default HooksUseEffects
